001package com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.client;
002
003import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.client.service.model.ApplicationInstance;
004import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.client.service.model.Challenge;
005import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.exception.DidException;
006import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.types.Claim;
007import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.types.ClaimReference;
008import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.types.Request;
009import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.types.Share;
010
011import java.util.List;
012import java.util.UUID;
013
014public interface DidMessageListener {
015
016    void handleShare(UUID senderId, String message, Challenge challenge, List<Share> shares, List<DidException> errors, ApplicationInstance appInstance);
017
018    void handleShareRequest(UUID senderId, String message, Challenge challenge, List<String> shares, ApplicationInstance appInstance);
019
020    void handleClaim(UUID senderId, String message, Challenge challenge, Claim claim, List<DidException> errors, ApplicationInstance appInstance);
021
022    void handleExpiredClaim(UUID senderId, String message, Challenge challenge, ClaimReference expiredClaim, List<DidException> errors, ApplicationInstance appInstance);
023
024    default void handleSecureMessage(UUID senderId, String message, Challenge challenge, ApplicationInstance appInstance) {
025    }
026
027    void handleException(DidException error, ApplicationInstance appInstance);
028
029
030    default void handleError(Exception e, ApplicationInstance appInstance) {
031    }
032
033    default void handleRequest(Request request, ApplicationInstance appInstance) {
034    }
035
036}
